title: Thin film - 600 nm light and air-oil-water

A beam of monochromatic light with a wavelength <math alttext="lambda equals 600 nanometers" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>Î»</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>600</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>nm</mtext></mstyle></math> is traveling through the air, perpendicular to the surface of the oil.
